install.name: Live Chat
install.author: Justin Cook
install.copyright: This module is released under the GNU/GPL License.
install.description: This module enables a customizable live chat box on your website, provided through Chatango (requires registration at chatango.com)

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: module_description
param.label: Module title
param.description: This text will be displayed above the list with newsletters

param.name: chat_width
param.label: Chat width
param.description: Width of chat window in pixels

param.name: chat_height
param.label: Chat height
param.description: Height of chat window in pixels

param.name: chat_text_bg
param.label: Main text background Color - use 'trans' for transparent

param.name: chat_input_bg
param.label: Input background Color - use 'trans' for transparent
